about:
I've been on Minecraft for a while...
Before I was introduced to Minecraft I usually was on my PS3. It was fun until I was introduced to Minecraft by my neighbor _Knightdoesmc_  or rather my original account I gave away.
you'd usually see him wandering around hub. 
Anyway I started leaving my life of a PS3 gamer and started getting used to PC Gaming especially Minecraft until the point I started playing multiplayer in Minecraft in the Xbox 360 Edition.
I usually create survival series on my old (deleted) youtube account until it started getting boring... I've heard many "stories" of how the PC Edition was much better. I was pretty excited when my brother gave me a gift card. It wasn't long till I bought Minecraft PC Edition. The first server I ever joined (officially) was non other then MC Zone Network otherwise known as Avicus Network....

And that's how I ended up here...
In Avicus Network My #1 Server
interests: Video  Gaming, Playing the Guitar, Indoor sports
